body.name: Monarch Specialties 1003 Table, 3pcs, Small, 35" Drop Leaf, Kitchen, Laminate, Brown, Contemporary, Modern Dining Set, 35" L x 35" W x 30" H, Dark Taupe/Black Metal
features: 3-PIECE SET - Includes 1 dining table and 2 chairs: the drop-leaf table features a dark taupe wood-look tabletop and black metal legs; the armless, ladder-back style chairs have black metal frames and padded seats upholstered in black leather-look fabric

SPACE-SAVING DESIGN - The round table has 2 drop leaves (7 inches L each) and measures 35 inches L x 35 inches W x 30 inches H with both leaves up; each chair measures 15.75 inches L x 16.25 inches W x 33 inches H and fits snugly between the table legs

STURDY CONSTRUCTION - The drop leaves are attached with metal hinges and held up by 4 sliding support bars and metal brackets, while wooden stoppers prevent the bars from sliding out; the weight limit is 120 lbs for the table and 220 lbs for each chair
READY TO ASSEMBLE - Detailed, illustrated instructions and all hardware required for assembly are provided for convenience; additional tools may be needed

CHOOSE WITH CONFIDENCE - Monarch Specialties is a leader in furniture and home décor, developing products that offer outstanding value and style for over 50 years; your purchase will be well packaged for protection and to facilitate timely delivery
body.description: This dining table set with a drop-leaf table and 2 chairs delivers maximum style and functionality while taking up minimal space. Laminated in a dark taupe wood-look finish for a rustic touch, the tabletop and drop leaves feature thick-panel construction and are finished on all sides for a polished look even when the leaves are down. Lift up one leaf, both leaves, or keep them both down according to the surface space you need. The table legs and chair frames are in metal with a black finish for a modern look. The chair seats are padded and upholstered in a black faux leather fabric for comfort. This 3-piece set for small spaces is ideal for eat-in kitchens, apartments, and dorm rooms, and is so versatile that it can be used for more than just dining. The all-purpose round table can function as an office desk for studying or working from home and as an accent table for displaying decorative items, while the lightweight yet sturdy chairs can serve as a desk chair or guest chairs. Additional measurements: Depth of chair seat: 14.5 inches Height of chair back from seat: 15 inches Height from floor to seat: 18 inches

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Table is tricky to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: Like the dining set. However in picture you only see 1 chair. On the 2nd chair predrilled holes did not line up. Welding broke when trying to tighten and align holes. Now I have to get a welder to fix cross bar. So chair can be assembled. Frustrating.
